description: Erection of a single-storey rear extension at basement level and elevational alterations to the northern elevation at ground floor level.
decision_conditions:
All new external finishes in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.


REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.

<p>The development hereby permitted and the removal of the existing unlawful basement must be completed no later than the expiration of four months beginning with the date of this permission.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: In order to ensure the amenity impacts to adjoining occupiers are acceptable.&nbsp;</p>

The development hereby approved shall be demolished to and all materials resulting from the demolition shall be removed within one months of the date of failure to meet any one of the requirements set out below:


i) Within two months of the date of this decision details of the following matters shall have been submitted for the written approval of the local planning authority which shall include a timetable for implementation.

a) Detailed specification and a drainage layout of the green roof (minimum substrate depth of 80mm, not including the vegetative mat) and SuDS planter. 


REASON: To ensure that adequate sustainable drainage is provided within an appropriate timeframe in the interests of flood risk mitigation.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
